purpose: The email announces the 5th IEEE International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ'25), scheduled for December 13, 2025, at Ural Federal University in Russia. It aims to gather researchers to discuss improvements in code quality through topics like static analysis and bug detection. The conference will be hybrid, allowing both in-person and remote presentations. Important dates for paper submissions and notifications are provided, along with details about the program committee and publication criteria.

infos:
Subject: CfP: 5th IEEE International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ'25)

Name: 5th International Conference on Code Quality (ICCQ)
